content: You can make suggestions, and vote on features, at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android. We'd love to have them.
creator: wsmwk

content: Settings > General settings > Display > "Account list" section > check "Show Unified Inbox" > close Thunderbird for Android > start Thunderbird for Android again.
creator: Yu5tiqX9og
